statements: SELECT * FROM dance_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM dance_classes WHERE class_capacity > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_id FROM dance_classes;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM dance_classes ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_capacity FROM dance_classes WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM dance_classes WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY class_id DESC
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM dance_classes WHERE class_capacity > 20
SELECT class_name, class_capacity FROM dance_classes WHERE instructor_id = 3 LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2
SELECT * FROM dance_classes WHERE class_capacity < 10 AND class_schedule LIKE 'Mon%'
SELECT instructor_id, COUNT(class_id) AS total_classes FROM dance_classes GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING total_classes > 5 ORDER BY total_classes DESC
SELECT * FROM dance_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM dance_classes ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, class_day FROM dance_classes WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollments WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM dance_classes WHERE class_day = 'Monday';
SELECT class_name, class_time FROM dance_classes WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_id, class_day, class_time FROM dance_classes ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollments JOIN dance_classes ON student_enrollments.class_id = dance_classes.class_id WHERE class_day = 'Friday';
SELECT * FROM student_enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM DanceClasses;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM DanceClasses;
SELECT instructor_name, specialty FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM StudentEnrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DanceClasses JOIN Instructors ON DanceClasses.class_id = Instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM DanceClasses WHERE class_id = 1
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, specialty FROM Instructors ORDER BY instructor_name DESC
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM DanceClasses WHERE class_schedule LIKE '%Monday%'
SELECT student_id, class_id, enrollment_date FROM StudentEnrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT class_id, COUNT(student_id) AS student_count FROM StudentEnrollments GROUP BY class_id HAVING student_count > 5
SELECT * FROM Dance_Classes;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM Dance_Classes ORDER BY class_schedule DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule, instructor_name FROM Dance_Classes JOIN Instructors ON Dance_Classes.class_id = Instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT enrollment_id, class_id, student_id FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY enrollment_date;
SELECT * FROM Dance_Classes;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM Dance_Classes;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_specialty = 'Hip Hop';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT class_name, student_name, enrollment_date FROM Dance_Classes JOIN Enrollments ON Dance_Classes.class_id = Enrollments.class_id JOIN Students ON Enrollments.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT * FROM dance_classes;
SELECT class_name, class_time FROM dance_classes ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT student_name, email, phone_number FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT instructor_name, specialty FROM instructors WHERE specialty = 'Salsa';
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM dance_classes ORDER BY class_capacity DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_time, instructor_id FROM dance_classes WHERE class_capacity > 10;
SELECT student_name, email, phone_number, enrollment_date FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE enrollments.class_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, specialty FROM instructors LEFT JOIN class_schedule ON instructors.instructor_id = class_schedule.instructor_id WHERE class_schedule.schedule_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time, venue FROM dance_classes INNER JOIN class_schedule ON dance_classes.class_id = class_schedule.class_id WHERE class_schedule.instructor_id = 2;
